website_summaries.verdict: A stainless steel exterior and a tempered glass lid give this liquid-fueled chafer an elegant appearance on the serving table without sacrificing functionality.
pros: Sterno tray safely suspended above table
Sturdy glass lid and holder included
Water tray for indirect heating and moisture retention
cons: Pans are not as heavy duty as promoted, and include dividers

customer_reviews.title: I love these there or make well they are wonderful I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these there or make well they are wonderful I buy them for Christmas and it was the best decision I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: janel thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and nice alternative to the rectangle shape to add visual appeal to your catering line. These did not come with the separated dish, they were both full, round dishes. They are a nice weight and can look great mixed with nice roll top dishes for a fancier look, or mixed with casual chafers for a dress down event.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Multiple dents in both sets.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them, and they came with little dents here and there on both sets.. If I didn't need to use them right away for Thanksgiving, I would have sent them back. The cover is not an adequate weight to use to partially close the Sterno part way. Too flimsy. Had to use with Sterno going full blast. The pan and lid have a nice weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma11

customer_reviews.title: LID HANDLE BROKE AFTER ONE USE
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Purchased this product months ago for my baby's 1 year birthday party on March 11. Used this once, and while cleaning it, the handle broke off the lid. So now, I have a chafing dish, with a lid, that has no handle. Since I purchased it months ago, I was not eligible to "replace" the order. So now I'm stuck. Quality is terrible, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and I love the very strong glasd lid
customer_reviews.text: Arrived withs damaged package and the interior of the dishes had only minor scratches. I Recieved my chafing dishes without a divider in the center of either one of them. I'm very thrilled about that. The quality is very good and I love the very strong glasd lid. The holder for the is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Eva U.

customer_reviews.title: What went wrong?
customer_reviews.text: This could have been user error but when we used it to keep ham warm before dinner, it overcooked it and made the ham dry. We might have had too much sterno or some other problem. The pan is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Klingele

customer_reviews.title: Good but......
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but I would like the option of purchasing a liner that is not divided. I'll keep looking for the insert that holds 1 item vs. The divided pan that accommodates 2
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed when I got them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year. I was so disappointed when I got them. There is a divider inside the pan and it was not stated anywhere in the product description. It was too late for me to send them back. I ordered 3. I wish there is a way to replace the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product.
customer_reviews.text: Got them today. They look great! Some reviews complaining about a divided pan but these don’t have the divider. Might order 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chaffing dish. I did not realized it had a divider which is perfect for when you have multiple appetizers. The unit is elegant and well made, without being overly heavy. The size is large without being overwhelming. It has these grooves to catch the hook and hold the lid which is nice. The bottom tray for the alcohol can is set high so it does not touch the table. The prices is reasonable. Both units served beautifully at my buffet.
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: I just opened it today for my bday party since ...
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it today for my bday party since I bought it and there’s no holder in the lid. But since it was my party I needed to use it for my dish and I have no choice but to use it. I’m unhappy about one lid that the handle is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Elma

customer_reviews.title: ... excited to open these Food Warmer 1st & 2nd Good but the 3rd boxes its not okay it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to open these Food Warmer 1st & 2nd Good but the 3rd boxes its not okay it has scratch and the lid is separated by the convertible burner I send you the pictures already. I'm gonna use this for the Xmas Party next week for the Veterans thank you
customer_reviews.author: Editha Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to a friend for Christmas. She said it was the bet gift she received.
customer_reviews.author: pvperch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,  very classy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use.. looked amazing. Very pleased with this purchase. Will be buying more soon.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: It has water stains and also burned marks on the bottom of the pan.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: used it for some events ive hosted. easy to use and clean. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has a cover holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when it was on sale. I love that it has a cover holder. Bought some from a restaurant supply store and it did not have a cover holder and it cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Berns

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast for a last minute purchase.. used it for an outdoor party

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use outside for "Happy Hour" everyday at work. Functional and worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value of money and is also a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chafing dishes.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Love the clear lid and holder. Divided pan allows for more menu options or fill both halves with the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: mike riedmuller

customer_reviews.title: FYI SMALL with TWO COMPARTMENTS
customer_reviews.text: The chafing dish functioned well. Please be advised that it is a SMALL chafing dish and there are TWO compartments (you cannot remove the divider). This chafing dish is ideal if you are heating a "two-part" dish such as rice and gravy because you can place the rice on one side and the gravy on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug Lover

customer_reviews.title: but great for small parties and two hot dips
customer_reviews.text: split bowl. kinda weird, but great for small parties and two hot dips, etc. overall nice piece of equipment

customer_reviews.title: I like the lid holder and clear glass lid
customer_reviews.text: I like the lid holder and clear glass lid. Great buy! Serves the purpose. The food dish is divided but that's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ~Love2BMom

customer_reviews.title: but a good chafing dish
customer_reviews.text: Found a similar product for $14 less at another store. This was not worth $44, but a good chafing dish. I was able to achieve the look i was going for at my thanksgiving dinner with the other dishes that i purchased.

customer_reviews.title: Well invested money
customer_reviews.text: I just got my chafing dish, it is beautiful, well made and elegant, worth the money!

customer_reviews.text: Very neat on my table whenever I have a party. Looking forward to buy another one and hoping for posted on sale.

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it for the price but the food you ...
customer_reviews.text: Its worth it for the price but the food you serve has to be a dry food or the same type if there is sauce because the middle separating device isnt sealed - it leaks to the other side and it cant come out. I returned it because of that.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice dish! It worked out very well and looked ...

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality though
customer_reviews.text: The description is very misleading. If I had spent some time staring at the picture, I would have realized that the food trays are actually divided into two compartments. I love the quality though, and if the tray was not divided, I would have kept these chaffing dishes in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Nylah Khan

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in March 2018 and didn't open to use until Christmas 2018...one of the handles were broken when removed from box for the first time.

customer_reviews.title: chafing at its best
customer_reviews.text: just what i need for my christmas party. i wanted a good presentation and a dish big enough to put my special crab and shrimp dip,

Not too heavy and I liked the fact that the food bowl was detachable so I could carry the whole set on my own. I was the envy of the ladies at my function. Makes you look classy in a small way.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. This is going to be good for the family gathering and friends It is easy to clean and set up and also easy for storage.

customer_reviews.title: Love them-I now own three
customer_reviews.text: What better way to serve your favorite dishes-good looking, easy to clean and space saving. They were a big hit for the holidays

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible !!!!! Please don't purchase these and waste your money ! The partition in between worthless , food leaks over to the other side !

customer_reviews.text: It came sooner than expected. I bought as a gift for my mom and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I will buy more of these for parties

customer_reviews.text: the divided bowl is a pain and not what I wanted. If there is a replacement bowl/pan available let me know

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: It is a separated dish with a divider. Didn't realize that, nor is there a water line. I accidentally overfilled it and the water boiled over a little, but the food stayed hot, and thats what its designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: monica mcmasters

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easily cleans
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has two divisions so you can actually serve two dishes in one container. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love it, this is actually the best
customer_reviews.text: I love it , this is actually the best. Just what I wanted. Recommend it to all.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for parties!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of entertaining and these warmers do a great job and are pretty to look at. Nice clear lids with a holder to keep the lid attached
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Eckel

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Notice that the pan is divided so you can use it to serve 2 items or one item on both sides. Its easy to clean. The lid holder is an added feature to the dish. For the price I was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: m. kraft

customer_reviews.title: I like but i eill prefer if it doesn!'t have de divicion in the mitle because it is dificult to was it..!!! Some peopleike like
customer_reviews.text: I like but i eill prefer if it doesn!'t have de divicion in the mitle because it is dificult to was it..!!! Some peopleike like that to put 2 diferents foods on it but fir me it is not usefull.!!
customer_reviews.author: Favem

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well ! Have gotten several complaints @ a awesome price
customer_reviews.author: heather magnon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these and did not know that there is a divider in the middle. I want my money back! The description should have said there is a divider in the middle
customer_reviews.author: mommyof5

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Scratched / Damaged
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived scratched in several places, which was very disappointing. I needed it for a party within 2 days from when I opened the package, so I had no time to reorder or send it back. It is functional, and worked fine, but having the scratches and wondering why I received a damaged product left a bad feeling for me. The food stayed warm, and it held enough for relatively big portions.
customer_reviews.author: Brainy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the Cuisinart 11-inch round buffet server at the same time. I thought I could use both. I'm returning this product. It is bulky, ugly and has very sharp edges. There is no comparison to the elegance and beauty of the Cuisinart product. I was worried that the Cuisinart wasn't a "real" chafing dish with the water dish. The Cuisinart product performed excellently--it keep the food warm without drying it out. Finally, this is advertised as heavy duty--it is bigger/bulkier than the Cuisinart yet the Cuisinart is "heavier duty" than this product. Don't buy this product; buy the Cuisinart buffet server instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshaw

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces & Poor / NO Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this chafing dish was because of the lid holder accessory....and guess what....it came withOUT the little metal lid holder piece!!! So i reach out to the company directly, (Info was on the product box - they are in California) telling them I bought it on Amazon and all i needed was this little metal piece accessory to hold the lid (it slips into these pre-made holes...easy assembly). I left my name, contact information and everything. I got nothing! No email reply, no phone call, nothing!! Im really unhappy. In my eyes, this is useless. What a waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Silk

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and well priced
customer_reviews.text: These are a great for the home entertainer. The serving dish is divided into two separate areas (Which cannot be removed), which does not leak into each other. I would recommend for small accessions as it holds 4 Quarts. Water pan can be used as a serving dish also, and it is not divided. Also the lid holder is quite convenient as not having to place lid on table, which dirty"s the tablecloth. The price is excellent for the quality as I searched several sites, I also like the shape compared to the popular rectangle shape. Bought three of these, and would recommend to anyone wanting to serve with elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Tana de Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Attractive chafing dishes, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for Christmas 2017. Excellent pieces at an affordable price, perfect size. Everyone was impressed and they worked well. Just pay attention to the heat once they get going and the water goes from hot to boiling. Also, order double the sterno you think you need!
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Very classy yet simple touch.
customer_reviews.text: Being in the event planning business these really add a very classy look to any buffet or food setting. The look n feel of the dishes really add a nice statement touch to the event.
customer_reviews.author: Insatiable C.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this chaffing dish is absolutely amazing. mine came and the handle was broke i wasnt happy about that but the chaffind dish itself was absolutely amazing so i didnt even care lol. i purchased 4 of them i plan to purchase more they are great for parties. i am not sure if you all can tell but there is a divider in the middle and nope it cant be removed so you have to leave it in there. other than that great products and it shipped fast
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect chafing dish for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect chafing dish for my needs. It's a good size and yes, the middle section does not come out, but you can still use it for one dish if you want. I bought the wWnware 8qt chafer, which is great, but I really like this size and wish I had bought 2! Also the fact that you can put the lid on the side makes it east for party guest to get food without having to hold the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mamach

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for a party
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these babies for a party and have no regrets. The only two improvements I'd suggest are: a water level marker in the water pan and a spoon holder. Otherwise excellent product. Update: Taking off a couple of stars because the lid handle broke off due to a very weak connection. Based on the comments this seems like a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: juices from one side leeks into other side~~not welded very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This worked great to keep cinnamon donut holes warm for a brunch, fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: M. kuban

customer_reviews.title: Good and practical chafer for home entertaining
customer_reviews.text: The low cost chafer works as expected. The product quality is not consistent. I bought 4 of them and had to return one due to severe dent on the center divider. Every unit arrived also comes with small issues, such as small leak through the center divider and rusty finishing on the interior. Those small issues can be ignored for home use.
customer_reviews.author: H. J.

customer_reviews.title: To get what I ordered !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same thing a while back and it was a divided pan that’s what I wanted!!!! I just got it again and it’s not divided 😩🙁😣 I am very sad !
customer_reviews.author: Donna E. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice Weight
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Constructed well. Nice weight, glass top. There is a center divider which is non removable. I wish it was designed to remove the center divider, otherwise very nice
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered was not as described
customer_reviews.text: Was not as described. Arrived without the dividers. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LEFLOF

customer_reviews.title: but worked fine for keeping the pesto pasta away from the rice
customer_reviews.text: worked really well. Kept side dishes hot but not dried out for hours. I was surprised how much fit in each side. probably not suitable for keeping liquids or really thin sauces separate the divider did not look water tight. but worked fine for keeping the pesto pasta away from the rice. I will likely buy a second before my next gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Mlwdragons

customer_reviews.title: ordered 5 all but one was is new condition all ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered 5 all but one was is new condition all others were scratched or rusted. I am still stuck with one
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Classy
customer_reviews.text: Love these..they are made well and worked wonderfully. I received alot of compliments at my brunch. Seems that they have increased in price. I paid 24.99 each
customer_reviews.author: NargeeisBlessed

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on Christmas Eve and worked wonderfully! Soooo happy with my chafing dish, always wanted to have one! I used it with "dry" food like rice and mashed potatoes so I don't know if it would run over to the other side. So far, I'm more than satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gioia

customer_reviews.title: The divider does not come out!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the description carefully. There is a divider in the middle of the food holder which can not be removed, which was very disappointing. I am now having to pay $10 to ship it back because i cant use it. :(
customer_reviews.author: adavi

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for my party
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my party. Beautiful and useful! We had an outdoor party and so the ability to keep good converted and at the right temperature was essential. Cleaned up easy and looking forward to using it again!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Snyder

customer_reviews.title: ease of keeping things warm
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and looks great as a serving dish
customer_reviews.author: Jack's Place

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the products, i wish the can sell more for that price! Good quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower07

customer_reviews.title: The receiver of this gift loved it because the dish is divided into two compartments
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Excelsteel 4 Qt buffet as a gift. The receiver of this gift loved it because the dish is divided into two compartments, which provides separation if you choose to put 2 different side dishes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Epiffany

customer_reviews.title: The bottom burns easily. The heat is not distributed evenly
customer_reviews.text: The bottom burns easily. The heat is not distributed evenly. No recommended

customer_reviews.title: I like the chafing dish
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. I like the chafing dish. One of them was fine but the other arrived with 2 indents in the lid of the bowl. I didn't think it was that big of a deal. I covered it with plastic and bent it back with pliers. Too much of a hassle to send back. Food pan is not as big as I thought it would be. But it will due.
customer_reviews.author: Camille R. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply constructed. The metal has rough edges and the seams are crude. It will serve its purpose, but if you are looking for a good table presentation, I would not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: sheila ford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The chafers were perfect for my event. They looked elegant and everyone loved the extra touch. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The two separate compartments are fantastic! They kept the food nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: The two separate compartments are fantastic! They kept the food nice and warm. The lid holder is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it's designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't use it yet, but it looks just like one we do use and I suspect it will work very well too. being stainless steel, at least it won't have to be polished.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Zerbolio

customer_reviews.title: 5 wife just didn't like the separator in the
customer_reviews.text: really 4.5 wife just didn't like the separator in the pan
customer_reviews.author: NyChewy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased witht the quality of this product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this item! Can be used as a hot tray or cold try by placing ice in the bottom try. I use it for both!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the divider?
customer_reviews.text: These worked quite well for my holiday brunch. I was a tad bit disappointed the new design doesn’t include the divider. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Diva

customer_reviews.title: Would have thought it would be of better quality.
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the lid broke when washing it after 1 use. Would have thought it would be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are divided bowl units!
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great and they returned them with no issue because I didn't want divided bowls. Look really nice
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: good chaving dish
customer_reviews.text: it is a good chafing dish for the value, it is not so shiny but acceptable look, go for it if you need something good for the budget
customer_reviews.author: Essam Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Thanksgiving Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome. I was scared that they would be too small and have the dividers in them but the sizing was perfect and no dividers!! Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, and looks great on your buffet. I have recommended to family and friends. I'm going to pick up another one.
customer_reviews.author: markim24

customer_reviews.title: Nice for buffets
customer_reviews.text: Great size and very nice looking. Like the cover holder on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Foodgirl

customer_reviews.title: It came to the Thanksgiving Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new home in Florida and my sister had me hosting a Thanksgiving Dinner. I did not really come prepared for the amount of people she invited and I wanted my food to stay warm as people enjoyed their drinks and appetizers. I place the heated prepared food in this dish and hoped for the best. This was a wonderful investment as the food stayed warm and never burned. I actually went back and bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy for the price! I have similar comments as others. The divider in the middle helps to separate dishes, but looks tacky to put the same dish on both sizes to make a single dish. Direct head without using the water pan will burn any food you are cooking. Once the pan is burnt, it doesn't look good anymore inside of the pan. However, it's still usable. I lined the pan with foil and meat items, the foil burnt real bad too! Using the lid is cumbersome, but has a good purpose. Can be used w/hot or cold items. When new, they look elegant!
customer_reviews.author: jabari

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Chafing Dish
customer_reviews.text: This is more than i expected. I loved it and i know my guests were impressed. I have to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: 1Maee

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! THIS IS DIVIDED AND IT DOES NOT SAY SO IN DESCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: As for the Chafing Dish it works great. I would have returned it but I had to use it the night we opened it and I did not have time. I really wish they would have let me know it was divided I would not have bought it. It kept the food VERY hot and I like that it has a place to set the lid. I am now looking for one that is not divided:-)
customer_reviews.author: MARY ANNE

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It makes for a nice food display. I appreciated the division, allowed me to place different food items out. I did receive compliments on the servers. I purchased two.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

product_meta.title: Excelsteel 4-Quart Heavy Duty Professional Stainless Chafing Dish
product_meta.description: Get out of the kitchen and into the cooking spotlight, this durable stainless steel chafing dish maintains food at just the right temperature and can keep the food hot or cold for hours.
feature_bullets: Tempered glass lid allows you to monitor food condition and know when it's time to refill.
Also features a heavy duty stand to provide stability
Stay cool handles and knob for easy handling.
Set includes: 4 qt food tray, exterior water tray, tempered glass lid
Chafing dish stand with handles, glass lid holder and convertible burner with lid

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars238 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
